testimonials.title: What Developers Say
testimonials.description: Trusted by thousands of WordPress developers and agencies

items.text: WP-Site-Inspector has completely transformed how we handle client sites. We've cut our debugging time by at least 70% and can now identify issues before they become problems.
The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate. It's like having a senior WordPress developer looking over your shoulder and pointing out exactly what needs to be fixed.
I've tried many WordPress analysis tools, but none come close to the depth of insight that WP-Site-Inspector provides. The accessibility module alone is worth the price.
As someone who maintains dozens of WordPress sites, this plugin has been a game-changer. I can now quickly assess the health of any site and prioritize what needs attention.
